episodes.title: The Ex-Girlfriend
episodes.plot: After George breaks up with his girlfriend, Jerry decides that he wants to see her.

episodes.title: The Pony Remark
episodes.plot: Jerry fears that an inappropriate comment he made at a dinner party caused his relative's subsequent death.

episodes.title: The Jacket
episodes.plot: Jerry wears an expensive jacket when he meets Elaine's father, but an argument ensues when Jerry is reluctant to wear it outside during a snowfall.

episodes.title: The Phone Message
episodes.plot: George leaves several awkward messages on a girlfriend's answering machine, then decides to steal the tape.

episodes.title: The Apartment
episodes.plot: When an apartment becomes available in Jerry's building, he helps Elaine get it, only to regret his decision to do so. George starts wearing a wedding ring because he's heard that it helps single guys pick up women.

episodes.title: The Statue
episodes.plot: A statue wanted by George is stolen from Jerry's apartment by the boyfriend of a writer Elaine is working with.

episodes.title: The Revenge
episodes.plot: George takes revenge on his boss for not hiring him back after he quit and was rude to him, and Jerry and Kramer take revenge on a dry cleaner after Jerry accuses him of stealing $1,500 from his laundry bag.

episodes.title: The Heart Attack
episodes.plot: After suffering what he thinks is a heart attack, George discovers he has inflamed tonsils and seeks alternative medicine to heal.

episodes.title: The Deal
episodes.plot: Jerry and Elaine believe that they have found a foolproof way to start having sex again yet still remain just friends, but they quickly start encountering problems.

episodes.title: The Baby Shower
episodes.plot: Kramer convinces Jerry to get illegal cable. Elaine holds a baby shower for a former girlfriend of George, on whom he wants revenge for a callous incident.

episodes.title: The Chinese Restaurant
episodes.plot: Jerry, Elaine and George stop for a quick Chinese dinner before seeing "Plan 9 From Outer Space," but circumstances at the eatery make them miss the movie.

episodes.title: The Busboy
episodes.plot: George tries to apologize to a busboy after one of his comments got him fired, but he only makes things worse. Elaine tries to get one of her male friends out of her house.
